name: Covid:19
description:
Note : The game is based on fiction and does not link it with reality
The city is full of bad guys who try to kill innocents and spread the virus. A fighter appears to kill the bad enemies who spread the virus and game is thirdperson shooter game
Contains the story mode and the multiplayer mode


Current Features
Players support every time
Single player
MultiPlayer
Join at any time
up than 4k+ resolution support
60Hz-240Hz+ support
Supports:
Keyboard + Mouse
Controller Support

Song: Aurora B.Polaris - ANYTH1NG (ft. LXST ANGELES)
Link: https://youtu.be/dKy1T8wTcik
Music promoted by FreeMusicWave.
